item.title: Starknet: Identified Network Outage Cause, Deploying Fix Solution
item.description: On September 2nd, the Starknet team officially made an announcement that the reason for the network outage has been determined. They are currently in the process of deploying a fix and anticipate that Starknet will resume its operation shortly.

item.title: Crypto.com is partnering with Underdog to launch a sports prediction market in the United States.
item.description: On September 2nd, as per TheBlock, Underdog has entered into a partnership with Crypto.com's Derivatives North America. This partnership enables the launch of a sports prediction market in 16 states. The focus is on states where sports betting is not yet legal, like California and Texas. Once launched, fans will have the ability to trade on the outcomes of major leagues such as the NFL, NBA, MLB, and college football, and the prices will update in real-time.However, the Commodity Futures Trading Commission and federal courts are still engaged in discussions regarding whether the sports prediction market constitutes gambling, encroaches on state rights, or violates the Commodity Exchange Act.

item.title: Strategy is increasing the annual dividend yield of Series A Perpetual Preferred Stock "STRC" to 10.0%.
item.description: On September 2nd, Strategy (MSTR) announced that it is going to raise the annual dividend rate of the floating-rate Series A Perpetual Preferred Stock 'STRC' from 9.0% to 10.0%.

item.title: Bitcoin Reverses Losses to Break Above $110,000, with a 24-hour Gain of 0.85%
item.description: On September 2nd, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin reversed its downtrend and rose above $110,000, with a 24-hour increase of 0.85%.

item.title: US Stock Market Opening: Crypto Stocks Experience a Downtrend, WLFI Finance Company's ALTS Plunge 20%
item.description: On September 2nd, the US stock market ushered in the opening of the first trading day of the week. The Dow declined by 0.9%, the S&P 500 dropped by 1.2%, and the Nasdaq fell by 1.7%. Cryptocurrency stocks witnessed a general decline, encompassing:WLFI Treasury's ALT5 Sigma (ALTS) plunged by 20%. On August 11th, it announced the launch of a $1.5 billion private placement WLFI Treasury Strategic Initiative, with Eric Trump, the son of former President Donald Trump, joining the board;Bitmine (BMNR) decreased by 1.72%;SharpLink Gaming (SBET) fell by 2.6%;Coinbase (COIN) dropped by 2.29%;Circle (CRCL) went down by 3.88%;MicroStrategy (MSTR) fell by 0.13%;BTCS (BTCS) declined by 4.67%;ETHZilla (ETHZ) fell by 0.75%.

item.title: Yoshiharu Global will be renamed to Vestand and pursue a Crypto Treasury Strategy, acquiring Bitcoin and other digital assets
item.description: On September 2nd, Yoshiharu Global Co., a Japanese restaurant operator (listed on NASDAQ: YOSH), announced that starting from September 3rd, 2025, the company will change its name to Vestand Inc (VSTD) and will adopt a crypto treasury strategy, making investments in Bitcoin and other major digital assets.

item.title: Data: Avalon Labs has collected a total of $5.48 million in fees since June.
item.description: On September 2nd, as per DefiLlama data, since June, the cumulative transaction fee revenue of the Bitcoin financial services platform Avalon Labs has reached $5.48 million, and the average monthly transaction fee revenue is approximately $1.88 million. The platform's current TVL has reached $752 million.In May of this year, the Bitcoin stablecoin issuer Avalon Labs announced the completion of a strategic financing round, with YZi Labs taking the lead and participation from Mirana, CE Innovation Capital, and GSR.

item.title: U.S. publicly traded company Empery Digital has announced an additional purchase of 16.51 BTC, increasing its total holdings to 4,081.39 BTC.
item.description: On September 2nd, the US-listed company Empery Digital announced that it had increased its holdings by 16.51 BTC, raising its total Bitcoin holdings to 4,081.39 BTC. The total acquisition cost was approximately 480 million US dollars, with an average purchase price of around 117,517 US dollars.

item.title: Propanc Biopharma Plans to Purchase $100 Million Worth of Ethereum in the Next 12 Months
item.description: On September 2nd, the US-listed biopharmaceutical company Propanc Biopharma (PPCB) declared its intention to purchase $100 million worth of Ethereum within the next 12 months. Propanc Biopharma pointed out that this action would reinforce its overall corporate strategy in aspects such as cryptocurrency investment, drug development, and asset acquisition.

item.title: Conflux Foundation is exploring CFX Treasury collaboration with publicly traded companies, with a proposed lock-up period of not less than 4 years.
item.description: September 2nd: The Conflux Tree Graph officially launched the "Conflux Ecosystem Fund Authorization Announcement," indicating that the Conflux Foundation proposed to authorize the Ecosystem Fund to engage in cooperation with public companies (including those listed on capital markets in Hong Kong or the United States) to explore the potential for strategic cooperation in the fields of Digital Asset Treasury (DAT) and ecosystem development (POS node operation, on-chain liquidity, RWA asset management). The CFX tokens injected into the digital asset Treasury of public companies will have a lock-up period of no less than 4 years.The Foundation intends to initiate a community governance vote on this matter shortly and will subsequently release a voting announcement.
